name: robi-starter
description: Starter app for SharePoint 2013 on premise.
author: Stephen Matheis

scripts.start: concurrently "npx json-server --watch ./json-server/db.json --id Id" "npx live-server --cors --watch=./src --ignore=./src/lists.js,./src/app.js,./src/Robi/Actions,./src/Robi/Components,./src/Robi/Core,./src/Robi/Models --open=./dev/app.html --quiet" "node ./servers/post.js" "npm run watch-robi"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npx json-server --watch ./json-server/db.json --id Id" "npx live-server --cors --watch=./src --ignore=./src/lists.js,./src/app.js --open=./dev/app.html --quiet" "node ./servers/post.js" "npm run build-dev"
scripts.depgraph: depcruise --exclude "^node_modules" --output-type dot src | dot -T svg > dependencygraph.svg
